paragraph.heading: 1Metric toolbar
paragraph.paragraph: The toolbar of the metric tools contains the following fields:

list.item: name : to enter a name when saving a measure.
scope : a combo box to select a scope type.
metric : a menu containing all available metrics.
unit : displays the selected metric's unit.

16 16 /images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_new_measure_color.gif 0
calculate : evaluate a metric over ascope.

16 16 /images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_save_measure_color.gif 0
add : add a measure to the multi-column list and save it.

16 16 /images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_delete_measure_color.gif 0
delete : delete a set of measures from the multi-column list.
management : reorder, delete or edit metrics.

16 16 /images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_new_metric_color.gif 0
new metric : create a new composite metric.

16 16 /images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_view_measure_plus_color.gif 0 show
details : show details of a measure.
16 16 /images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_view_measure_minus_color.gif 0 hide details: hide details of ameasure.
archive : create, update or compare archive files.
